right_to_information.title: Right to Information (RTI) Act, 2005
right_to_information.description: The RTI Act allows Indian citizens to request information from any public authority.

consumer_rights.title: Consumer Protection Act, 2019
consumer_rights.description: Protects consumer rights and provides mechanisms for redressal of consumer disputes.
key_points: Right to be protected against unfair trade practices
Right to be informed about product quality and price
Right to choose from various products
Right to be heard in consumer forums
process: File a complaint with the Consumer Forum
